CustomField.formula: (5 * ( FLOOR( ( Current_EOQ__c+1 - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( Current_EOQ__c+1 - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - (5 * ( FLOOR( ( today() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8) ) / 7 ) ) + MIN( 5, MOD( today() - DATE( 1900, 1, 8), 7 ) ) ) - Holidays_To_EOQ__c
CustomField.label: BusDays To EOQ
